custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT OSBLCS_LCSClusterNode.* FROM OSBLCS_LCSClusterEntry, OSBLCS_LCSClusterNode, OSBLCS_LCSProject WHERE [$LCS_CLUSTER_ENTRY_NAME_TEMPLATE$] [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$LCS_PROJECT_NAME_TEMPLATE$] AND ( (OSBLCS_LCSClusterEntry.lcsClusterEntryId = OSBLCS_LCSClusterNode.lcsClusterEntryId) AND (OSBLCS_LCSClusterEntry.lcsProjectId = OSBLCS_LCSProject.lcsProjectId) )
